Dr Chan has been my family Dr for years. Whenever I have any cough, he would always prescribed the right medication. ÂØπÁóá‰∏ãËçØ! Have been his loyal customer/patient.

He is very professional, patient and kind. He also treats us with respect. Very humble senior consultant.

I had the privilege of consulting with Dr. Chan at the clinic for the first time today and was truly impressed by the meticulous approach he employed in evaluating my cough. Beyond his thoroughness, Dr. Chan also exercised discretion in recommending tests, ensuring they were pertinent to my specific needs which I truly appreciated. His attention to detail, patience, and compassionate demeanor left a lasting positive impression. Also yo mention, the team of efficient and helpful counter staff, who contributed to a seamless experience with minimal wait times. I wholeheartedly recommend this clinic ü©∑

Well versed in his field of medical knowledge (respiratory). Dr Chan is a very down to earth senior consultant. Couple with his extensive long years of experience in the medical field, he provides necessary options/treatment plan. An excellent doctor :)

Dr Chan was friendly and detailed with his checking, counter staffs were also helpful in explaining medication. Most importantly, my coughing problem was resolved after one consultation. Strongly recommended for those who have cough issues to consult here!

Dr Chan was very knowledgeable, and managed to diagnose the coughing fits that I was having for the past 3 weeks. The clinic was through in their diagnosis, and treatment plan for the next one month. Also, the nurse was really friendly, and put me at ease easily when doing the blow test!
